IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: RAI PROVIDES & OPERATES NURSING AND ASSISTED LIVING FACILITIES FOR THE ELDERLY.
IRS990.MissionDescription: THE MISSION OF THE ORGANIZATION IS ARTICULATED IN ITS ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION AS FOLLOWS:THE CORPORATION IS ORGANIZED EXCLUSIVELY FOR CHARITABLE PURPOSES AS DEFINED IN SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1986, AS AMENDED. IN FURTHERANCE OF THOSE CHARITABLE PURPOSES, THE CORPORATION SHALL BE EMPOWERED TO BUILD, LEASE, ACQUIRE AND OTHERWISE OWN AND OPERATE RESIDENTIAL FACILITIES, NURSING FACILITIES AND OTHER RELATED FACILITIES AND SERVICES FOR THE ELDERLY, MENTALLY RETARDED, MENTALLY ILL, DEVELOPMENTALLY DISABLED AND OTHER LIKE CONDITIONS WITHOUT REGARD TO RACE, RELIGION, COLOR, SEX, CREED OR NATIONAL ORIGIN OF SAID PERSONS. THE CORPORATION WILL NOT ENGAGE IN THE PRACTICE OF MEDICINE NOR RENDER ANY LICENSED PROFESSIONAL SERVICES.
IRS990.Description: ALL PROGRAM SERVICES RELATE TO PROVIDING AND OPERATING SKILLED NURSING FACILITIES, HEALTH CARE, ASSISTED AND SEMI-INDEPENDENT LIVING FACILITIES, AND OTHER RELATED SERVICES TO THE ELDERLY.

AddressUS.AddressLine1: 1101 S CAPITAL OF TEXAS HWYBLDG G

OtherLiabilities.Description: STANDBY LOAN AGREEMENT WITH FRANCES HOUSE, INC.
MORTGAGE NOTE PAYABLE TO FRANCES HOUSE, INC.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THERE WERE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS REPORTED OR REQUIRED TO BE REPORTED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: Procedure for Monitoring Grants in the U.S.:
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Schedule I, Part I, Line 2: THE GRANT REPRESENTS FORGIVEN INTEREST ON DEBT FROM RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF IOWA, A 501(C)(3) ORGANIZATION DOING BUSINESS AND LOCATED IN THE UNITED STATES.

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.Relationship: TWO DIRECTORS COMMON TO BOTH RAI & LTC ARE JEFF SHAW & IRWIN JANN.
Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: MANAGEMENT SERVICES ARE PROVIDED BY LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC, AS DESCRIBED ABOVE IN SCHEDULE O RELATIVE TO PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3. JEFFREY SHAW, WHO IS A DIRECTOR OF RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF ILLINOIS, INC., AND LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC, RECEIVED DIRECTOR'S FEES OF $0 FROM LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC, FOR THE FISCAL YEAR ENDING JUNE 30, 2010. IRWIN JANN, WHO IS A DIRECTOR OF RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF ILLINOIS, INC., AND LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC, RECEIVED DIRECTOR'S FEES OF $0 FOR THE FISCAL YEAR ENDING JUNE 30, 2010 AND COMPENSATION OF $48,000 FROM LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES MANAGEMENT SERVICES FROM LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC, AN UNRELATED COMPANY. THESE SERVICES INCLUDE OVERSIGHT, TRAINING, REGULATORY COMPLIANCE, QUALITY ASSURANCE PROGRAMS, HUMAN RESOURCE SUPPORT, MARKETING AND MAINTENANCE. RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF ILLINOIS, INC., OWNS 12.5% OF LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC., AND FRANCES HOUSE, INC., (PARENT ORGANIZATION OF RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF ILLINOIS, INC.) OWNS 12.5% OF LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC. THE REMAINING 75% OF LTC SUPPORT SERVICES, LLC, IS OWNED BY UNRELATED EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO HAS A NEGOTIATED ARMS LENGTH ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES CONTRACT WITH RFMS, INC., AN UNRELATED COMPANY, TO OBTAIN SERVICES SUCH AS CASH MANAGEMENT, ACCOUNTING AND FINANCIAL REPORTING, PAYROLL AND EMPLOYEE BENEFITS, INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY, REGULATORY MATTERS, AND OTHER GENERAL BUSINESS AND FINANCIAL MANAGEMENT SERVICES AS REQUIRED.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION IS A SUBSIDIARY OF FRANCES HOUSE, INC. FRANCES HOUSE, INC., IS THE MEMBER OF THE ORGANIZATION. FRANCES HOUSE, INC., ELECTS THE GOVERNING BODY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EACH MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS RECEIVES A PAPER COPY OF FORM 990 FOR THEIR REVIEW AND COMMENT PRIOR TO ITS FILING. THE BOARD ALSO REVIEWS IN DETAIL EACH FORM 990 FILED BY THE ORGANIZATION AT ITS REGULARLY SCHEDULED BOARD MEETINGS. ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, EACH BOARD MEMBER ATTENDS A TRAINING SESSION THAT PROVIDES UPDATES ON CURRENT EXEMPT ORGANIZATION TAX COMPLIANCE MATTERS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL OFFICERS, DIRECTORS AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO ATTEST TO THEIR COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS ALL COMPLETED CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENTS TO DETERMINE IF ANY CONFLICTS EXIST WHICH WOULD REQUIRE RESTRICTION ON PARTICIPATION IN THE GOVERNING BODY'S DELIBERATIONS AND DECISIONS IN ANY TRANSACTIONS INVOLVING THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: A PAPER COPY OF FORM 990 IS PROVIDED UPON REQUEST. THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS ALSO AVAILABLE VIA THE GUIDESTAR.ORG WEBSITE AND THROUGH THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S OFFICE OF THE STATE OF ILLINOIS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT MAKE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC EXCEPT THROUGH PUBLIC FILING REQUIREMENTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VII, SECTION A, COLUMN F:
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: RON WILSON IS EMPLOYED BY RFMS, INC., AND UNRELATED ORGANIZATION WHICH HAS AN ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES CONTRACT WITH RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF ILLINOIS, INC. THE TYPE OF SERVICES PROVIDED BY RFMS, INC., ARE DETAILED IN THE SCHEDULE O EXPLANATION ABOVE RELATIVE TO FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3. RON WILSON IS THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER OF RFMS, INC., AND THE COMPENSATION REPORTED IN COLUMN F REPRESENTS 100% OF THE WAGES AS REPORTED ON HIS RFMS, INC. FORM W-2, BOX 5 FOR THE CALENDAR YEAR 2009. THE COMPENSATION AMOUNT HAS NOT BEEN PRORATED BASED ON TIME SPENT PER ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: fORM 990, PART VII, SECTION A, COLUMN B:
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: APPROXIMATELY ONE HALF OF THE AVERAGE HOURS PER WEEK ESTIMATED FOR EACH DIRECTOR AND OFFICER IS DEVOTED TO RELATED ORGANIZATIONS LISTED ON SCHEDULE R.
THE PROCESS FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF ILLINOIS, INC., IS A SUBSIDIARY OF FRANCES HOUSE, INC. CONCEPTS PLUS, INC., PIONEER CONCEPTS, INC., AND PINNACLE OPPORTUNITIES, INC., ARE SUBSIDIARIES OF FRANCES HOUSE, INC. THE 501(C)(2) ORGANIZATIONS LISTED IN THIS SECTION ARE SUBSIDIARIES OF FRANCES HOUSE, INC. RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF IOWA, INC., IS RELATED TO RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF ILLINOIS, INC., ONLY BY SHARING A COMMON BOARD OF DIRECTORS.
THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS OF RESIDENTIAL ALTERNATIVES OF ILLINOIS, INC., WERE AUDITED AS PART OF THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL REPORT ISSUED FOR FRANCES HOUSE, INC., AND SUBSIDIARIES.
